benchmark_details.name: MULTICOM
benchmark_details.overview: MULTICOM is a benchmark dataset for commonsense generation that extends the COCOTEROS dataset to encompass four different languages: English, Spanish, Dutch, and Valencian. The task involves generating a commonsensical sentence that includes a given triplet of words.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the multilingual commonsense generation capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs).

data.source: Extended existing COCOTEROS dataset, translated into multiple languages.
data.size: 15,500 examples in total across four languages (3,875 training examples, 3,876 test examples).
data.annotation: Generated and manually reviewed for commonsense logic.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on similarities between generated sentences and reference sentences.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better commonsense reasoning capabilities.
methodology.baseline_results: Results for LLaMA model reported; other models also evaluated.
methodology.validation: Tested on multiple language models to ensure reliability.
